library.description: A jQuery calendar plugin for creating flexible calendars.
library.name: Calendario

library.description: Timeline is simple JavaScript driven calendar, which is written on top of jQuery JavaScript framework. Timeline is a horizontal representation of days in month. It can be used to display unlimited number of events with their descriptions.
library.name: Timeline calendar

library.description: dhtmlxScheduler is a JavaScript event calendar that allows you to add a full-featured, Google-like calendar on a web page. It offers Ajax-based, intuitive drag-and-drop interface and professionally-looking skins. The events can be displayed in Day, Week, Month, Year, Agenda views. Timeline and Multiple Resource View are also supported. dhtmlxScheduler is licensed under open-source GNU GPL and commercial license.
library.name: DHTMLX Scheduler

library.description: Yet another attempt writing a datePicker (calendar) that is accessible using the keyboard, requires no embedded JavaScript blocks, uses no pop-up windows and is suitable for use within documents served as application/xhtml+xml.
library.name: Unobtrusive Date-Picker Widget

library.description:
Webix Calendar is a JavaScript single-month calendar that can be effortlessly included into your app or web page. This widget allows your end users to select days, months, years and even current time.
Webix Calendar can be localized with the translation function that helps change the language of month and day names to whichever language is desired. Moreover, this JavaScript widget can show the week’s number and can be easily adapted to the local week’s starting day.
If you add a Webix calendar into your website or to be more precise connect with a text input form by using the control Datepicker, you’ll give your end-users the option to pick a desired date.
CSS fully defines the appearance of Webix Calendar making it lightweight and easily managed.
Webix Calendar is highly compatible with popular browsers such as IE10, Mozilla Firefox, Opera, Chrome and Safari.
Webix Calendar can be used in mobile apps that operate on all modern touch devices like iPhone, iPad, Android devices.
library.name: Webix Calendar

library.description: glDatePicker is a simple, customizable, lightweight date picker calendar plugin for jQuery weighing in 4KB compressed (11KB uncompressed).
library.name: glDatePicker

library.description: Date Picker component with a lot of options and easy to fit in your web application.
library.name: Date Picker

library.description: Use this plugin to unobtrusively add a datetimepicker, datepicker or timepicker dropdown to your forms
library.name: DateTimePicker

library.description: A highly-customizable, jQuery-compatible datepicker/timepicker (calendar/clock widget) and a powerful Date/String parse/format utility.
library.name: Any+Time™ JavaScript Library

library.description: Full month calendar jQuery plugin that looks like Google Calendar.
library.name: jQuery Frontier Calendar

library.description: CLNDR is a jQuery calendar plugin. It was created- you've heard this before- out of frustration with the lack of truly dynamic front-end calendar plugins out there.
library.name: CLDNR

library.description: The jquery-week-calendar plugin provides a simple and flexible way of including a weekly calendar in your application. It is built on top of jquery and jquery ui and is inspired by other online weekly calendars such as google calendar. If you require a monthly calendar view, I highly recommend checking out the FullCalendar plugin by Adam Shaw.
library.name: jQuery Week Calendar

library.description: wdCalendar is a jquery based google calendar clone. It cover most google calendar features. User can choose to have a daily view, weekly view or monthly view. User can easily create, update or remove events by drag & drop. It is very simple to to integrate wdCalendar with a database.
library.name: wdCalendar

library.description:
Date picker that allows you to select single dates or ranges across many month via scroll.
Features:
- popup/inline
- day/week/month select
- display current date
- allow disabling of dates and weekends
- language support for finnish, english, estonian, russian
library.name: jQuery continuousCalendar

library.description: oCalendar is a jQuery plugin that allows you to add an event calendar to your sites or projects easily. You can add, edit and delete events from the client side.
library.name: oCalendar

library.description: A jQuery plugin that attaches a popup calendar to your input fields or shows an inline calendar for selecting individual dates or date ranges.
library.name: jQuery Datepicker

library.description: A JavaScript Calendar
library.name: Kalendae

library.description:
The ShieldUI Calendar component - is a lightweight, very fast and highly customizable UI control which allows users to select a date and perform an action. 
The widget allows you to navigate through days, months and years. The calendar has rich client side API for interaction with the component.
library.name: ShieldUI Calendar component

library.description: The datepicker is tied to a standard form input field. Focus on the input (click, or use the tab key) to open an interactive calendar in a small overlay. Choose a date, click elsewhere on the page (blur the input), or hit the Esc key to close. If a date is chosen, feedback is shown as the input's value.
library.name: jQuery UI Datepicker

library.description: FullCalendar is a jQuery plugin that provides a full-sized, drag & drop calendar like the one below. It uses AJAX to fetch events on-the-fly for each month and is easily configured to use your own feed format (an extension is provided for Google Calendar). It is visually customizable and exposes hooks for user-triggered events (like clicking or dragging an event). It is open source and dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
library.name: FullCalendar

library.description: jMonthCalendar is a full month calendar that supports events. You simply initialize the calendar with options and an events array and it can handle the rest. The plugin does have extension points that allow the developer to interact with the calendar when the display is about to change months, after the display has changed months and when the event bubbles are clicked on. jMonthCalendar now supports hover extension points, hover over an event and trigger an event like an alert(); By default the events would each have a URL supplied that would link to a details page.
library.name: jMonthCalendar

library.description: MagiCalender is a visual calender jQuery script that will allow you to add important dates and upcoming events to your website. It has a “smart” search feature, allowing you to search dates and event names. The event descriptions can handle HTML , and the script itself is all XHTML compliant.
library.name: MagiCalender

library.description: jCal is a an innovative and sexy jQuery datepicker plugin that offers multi-day, multi-month calender datepicker options.
library.name: jCal
